result.title: FarmBook platform with code/installation documentation & user guide
result.description: This task is the actual development of the platform. This task uses the product requirements document from T4.1, as well as the UI/UX design from T4.2 to build the platform and connects to the Data Repository that will be built in parallel in T4.3. As part of this deliverable, extensive documentation will be created allowing for easy installation and modification of FarmBook by administrators of the platform.

result.title: EUREKA project website open for access
result.description: This deliverable refers to the development of a unique high quality visual identity brand platform style for the project including logo design colour palette digital style guide templates for newsletters documents presentations social media content project website This will be supported by LFG and will be compatible with the branding of the database interface and platform of the FarmBook in T42 The brand platform will ensure a consistent qualitative and correct development of EUREKA project website as well as for the C D of the project and the FarmBook platform hence the website design will be compatible with the database interface and FarmBook platform

result.title: FarmBook data repository and search engine with code/installation documentation and a user guide
result.description: This step in the project is going to focus on the development of the FarmBook data repository. Given the experience and know-how that has been accumulated through consortium members’ participation in data repository design and development, the EUREKA project aspires to build upon and extend the Knowledge Base concept that has initially been developed as part of the EURAKNOS project for centralizing knowledge for TNs. This deliverable will provide as output (I) a fully functional version of the FarmBook data repository and search engine, and (II) FarmBook data repository development and testing documentation, including the search engine on top of the repository, and user guide.

result.title: Report on available MA data + best practices
result.description: In this task EUREKA will analyse the type of data and the ways data are produced, collected and processed. The different types of knowledge objects and data present in the MAs will be mapped, analysed and evaluated on their contents, structures and methodologies of data generation. Special attention will be given to data gaps and other data that is less accessible based on the available knowledge and activities within the MAs.

result.title: Communication and Dissemination plan (Final)
result.description: The Dissemination and Communication plan will comprise the projects communication objectives and key messages target groups including media channels detailed plan of activities budget KPIs and evaluation mechanisms as well as a list of relevant projects and events with which TURNKEY RETROFIT will engage with The implementation of the plan will be reported in yearly periodic reports Regular updates in conjunction with the progress of exploitation and replication planning in WP2 to reflect priority stakeholders business and market trends

result.title: Communication and Dissemination plan (2nd)
result.description: The Dissemination and Communication plan will comprise the projects communication objectives and key messages target groups including media channels detailed plan of activities budget KPIs and evaluation mechanisms as well as a list of relevant projects and events with which TURNKEY RETROFIT will engage with The implementation of the plan will be reported in yearly periodic reports Regular updates in conjunction with the progress of exploitation and replication planning in WP2 to reflect priority stakeholders business and market trends

result.title: Benchmark of promising experiences of integrated renovation services emerging in Europe and customer-journey definition
result.description: A report analysing promising experiences of integrated renovation services emerging in Europe with the objective to benchmark the home renovation services operated by EP and OPER against them The report will include the overall definition of the customerjourney for the integrated TURNKEY RETROFIT service

result.title: Project website (Final)
result.description: An interactive easytouse and intuitive project website which will play a key role in the project and reaching the target groups defined by the dissemination and communication plan Towards the end of the project the structure of the website will evolve to tell the story of the project The landing site of the website will highlight key numbers and findings homeowner experiences and next steps in a communicative way

result.title: Standardised performance contract Slovakia
result.description: The standardised contract will be developed in the local language and will include all necessary elements to ensure the successful implementation of EE projects.
